alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains; Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 21 at 10:22PM MST until November 23 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM TUESDAY TO 4 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Lookout Pass, Orin-Rice Road, Colville, Wallace, Northport, Mullan, Schweitzer Mountain Road, Newport, Osburn, Chewelah, St. Maries, Eastport, Springdale-Hunters Road, Bonners Ferry, Priest River, Athol, Dobson Pass, Fourth Of July Pass, Kettle Falls, Flowery Trail Road, Fernwood, Kellogg, Pinehurst, Sandpoint, and Deer Park. * WHEN...From 3 PM Tuesday to 4 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick. Winter travel conditions are expected. Tuesday evening commute could be impacted.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
